title: You won’t find a better Apple Watch SE deal than this blowout Prime Day sale
content:
Macworld

The 2nd-gen Apple Watch SE doesn’t get the attention of Apple’s newest watches, but at $249, it’s still one of the best smartwatch values you can get. And today’s Prime Day deal makes it a downright bargain: Amazon is selling the 40mm Apple Watch SE for $170 and the 44mm Apple Watch SE for $200, a savings of $79 each and the best price we’ve ever seen.

The Apple Watch SE is a budget version of the Series 6, with the same design and some higher-end features missing, including an EKG sensor and always-on display. But otherwise, you’re getting the same timeless Apple Watch design and advanced health features, including an always-in altimeter, and 18-hour battery life. You’ll also get all of the features of watchOS 11, including the Vitals app and fitness summaries.

At its full price, the Apple Watch SE is a fantastic entry-level watch for anyone who doesn’t need all the fancy features of a $400-plus smartwatch. But at this discount, it’s a must-have for anyone who wants to stay healthy and informed.
